LoopTunnel Properties

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Tunnel. View the class hierarchy.

PropertyDescription
Condition TerminalReturns a reference to the condition terminal of the referenced conditional tunnel. If the tunnel does not have a conditional terminal, this property returns an error. Details
Index ModeGets or sets the indexing mode of the tunnel. Details
Is Conditional?Gets or sets the conditional mode of the tunnel. Details
